Michael O'Rourke

I define and design products for cloud markets.

Michael O'Rourke

Forward-thinking technologist who blends strategic vision with practical execution to deliver high-tech products and solutions. Distinct ability to translate insights into compelling strategies that drive growth and ensure client success.
Recognized for identifying emerging trends, implementing new market initiatives, and driving go-to-market tactics. Functional experience spanning all disciplines, from ideation and development to marketing and optimization. Skilled at delivering product and marketing capabilities.

Work Experience

Product Manager

Micro Focus / 2016 - Present

1 Year

Developed product initiatives and strategies for Application, Mobile, and Virtualization solutions. Defined feature-functionality for release candidates, POVs, priorities, and roadmaps across core teams.

Product Manager

Softlayer, an IBM Company / 2012 - 2016

4 Years

Drove new product creation from ideation to adoption for sophisticated cloud ecosystems and services. Outlined marketing investments against key competitors, steered courses for technology initiatives, and delivered product offerings to market.

Senior Product Manager

Neopost / 2007 - 2012

5 Years

Cultivated pipelines to new digital, e-commerce, and cloud-based markets. Researched market needs, designed product offerings, and drove the product vision, value proposition, messaging, and go-to-market planning for customer-facing products.

Technical Product Manager

Neopost / 2003 - 2017

4 Years

Orchestrated software releases, implementations, and launch efforts. Served as the technical interface between Software Development, Quality Assurance, and Release Management.

What They Say

Michael is the type of resource that every Product Marketing person wish they had. Not only does he master all technical areas under his responsibility, he has this unique capacity to relate how things work in a simple, non-technical way that speaks clearly to the end-user. Michael also showed his capacity to lead product-related projects, and played a key role in the success of many product launches.

Director, Business Development / Alfresco

Michael is truly innovative and creative in all that he accomplishes. Several times here he established a new benchmark for how things should be done. He is very methodical in the way he approaches problems and goes about to fully understand something before rushing to judgment.

Director, Product Engineering / Neopost USA

I could always count on Michael to provide me with a thorough and realistic project plan that allowed me to manage go-to-market efforts. I relied on his guidance to determine feature priorities, trade-offs and workload estimates. With his knowledge, experience and strong work ethic, Michael will be a valuable asset to any team.

Sr. Director, Marketing / Neopost USA

I had a chance to work on a variety of projects that were ultimately successful due to Michael's hard work and attentiveness. He worked very closely with our team to ensure the work could be accomplished on time. He also does a fantastic job at conveying exactly what the customer wants.

Sr. Quality Engineer / Sailpoint

I could always count on Michael to provide me with a thorough and realistic project plan that allowed me to manage go-to-market efforts.
